Regulation Name(s): Analyzer, Chemistry (Photometric, Discrete), For Clinical Use
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): A1C EZ Glycohemoglobin Analysis System analyzer
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for BioHermes A1C EZ Glycohemoglobin Analysis System for quantitative measurement of percent HbA1c in venous whole blood using boronate affinity chromatography in clinical laboratories
Indications for Use Summary: In vitro diagnostic test to quantitatively measure percent glycohemoglobin A1c or fraction mmol/mol in venous whole blood samples for monitoring long term glycemic control in patients previously diagnosed with diabetes; not for screening, diagnosis, or neonatal use; intended for professional use in clinical laboratories
